title: How to Complete the Big Trouble in Big Town Quest in Fallout 3

steps.headline: Talk to the residents of Big Town.
steps.description: They will agree as a whole that they face certain doom from the Super Mutants.

steps.headline: Offer the residents to help recover their kidnapped friends.
steps.description: They will direct you to Germantown Police HQ.

steps.headline: Travel to Germantown Police HQ.
steps.description: Bring along a combat shotgun and a Chinese officer's sword.

steps.headline: Kill the Super Mutants outside the police station.
steps.description: Scrounge around for supplies, then rest outside in a tent before braving the building.

steps.headline: Enter the police station.
steps.description: You can pick the lock at the ground floor (Lockpicking skill 100) or use the upper level door on the right side.

steps.headline: Sneak through the police station, killing Super Mutants as you find them with the Chinese officer's sword.
steps.description: Use the combat shotgun when you are caught.

steps.headline: Locate the jail cells.
steps.description: Make sure all the Super Mutants on the ground floor are dead, then open the cell (Lockpicking skill 50).

steps.headline: Talk to Red.
steps.description: Ask her if she was alone. She will tell you about Shorty in the basement. Tell her to stay put, then proceed to the basement.

steps.headline: Kill the Super Mutant guarding the basement.
steps.description: Untie Shorty and meet up with Red.

steps.headline: Exit the building.
steps.description: Fast travel back to Big Town.

steps.headline: Talk to Red again.
steps.description: She will thank you, but mention that the Super Mutants will come back. Either offer to fight the Super Mutants for them, or repair a broken Sentry Bot for them (Repair skill 50).

text: Talk to the residents of Big Town. They will agree as a whole that they face certain doom from the Super Mutants. Offer the residents to help recover their kidnapped friends. They will direct you to Germantown Police HQ. Travel to Germantown Police HQ. Bring along a combat shotgun and a Chinese officer's sword. Kill the Super Mutants outside the police station. Scrounge around for supplies, then rest outside in a tent before braving the building. Enter the police station. You can pick the lock at the ground floor (Lockpicking skill 100) or use the upper level door on the right side. Sneak through the police station, killing Super Mutants as you find them with the Chinese officer's sword. Use the combat shotgun when you are caught. Locate the jail cells. Make sure all the Super Mutants on the ground floor are dead, then open the cell (Lockpicking skill 50). Talk to Red. Ask her if she was alone. She will tell you about Shorty in the basement. Tell her to stay put, then proceed to the basement. Kill the Super Mutant guarding the basement. Untie Shorty and meet up with Red. Exit the building. Fast travel back to Big Town. Talk to Red again. She will thank you, but mention that the Super Mutants will come back. Either offer to fight the Super Mutants for them, or repair a broken Sentry Bot for them (Repair skill 50).
